creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: white, green, red on black; many rows of applied white with narrow white metal braid surround inner rows of wider flat white metal--some separated with red or green color; keyhole-type neckline; heavily decorated wide front panel; simple decorated back; very wide sleeve openings edges in red and yellow striped silk; all on black twill cotton
title: Dress
